Title: Forever.

Would you dance with me, if I asked you to?
Is this step to the right, too much for you to bare?
And this little piece of shelter we share..
Are you even there?
Sometimes I have to ask, and wonder.
And to dream and cry, it's the worst.
My worn jacket can't keep me from the wind much longer.
And the damage being thrown, I just can't back away.
This step back, a dance, and it's made for just us two.
Can we move to the left? 
We'll be safe under the spotlight. Unless..
You take the chance, and dare for another fight.
I swear, I'll hold onto you forever.
Just say you'll love me 'till the end of time.
And I'll tell you I love you a million times, if I have to.
I'll mean it every single time.
And even in the end, I'll never let go.
Not even when our skin is wrinkled, and I'm about to go in my forever place.
Where I shall rest.
Not ever, will I part with you.
I'll be there 'till the end.
And not even death could tear me apart from you.
Let's not take a step back. Not too much.
Because I just want to move forward with you.
And I don't want it to rewind.
Could we twirl, and I'll fall into your arms.
And you can hold me untill the very last star fades in the sky tonight.
This is ours, and it's forever to be held. 
Let's share a single kiss, and make it last.
To be stained in our memories, with a forever you and me.
A forever, us.

-Burps- A poem I wrote. I think it's one of my favorites!

I can feel my salty tears, burning at the brim.
I can't blink them back, or wipe them away.
They're there to stay.
As your doll, I'm broken.
I smile for you to see. 
But inside, I'm dying and falling.
I can't find my way, and I don't know how.
Lost in my emotions.
Inside I just want to be me, again.
I feel numb.
I can feel my heart break.
Into thousands of pieces.
You can't hear them.
Doubt you can even see it.
Whether you care or not.
I'm losing the fighting battle to be alive.
A strive that makes no sense.
I want to be at pure bliss.
When we touch and kiss.
But I can't, And I don't know why.
Pull my trigger. [x2]
So I can see my end.
Pull my strings.
And see me come to life.
With an automatic smile.
A life with joy.
Let me see you, for the very first time.
Our neverending love romance.
Love's last kiss.
For the first time, I want you to see.
Just how messed up I am.
I can't rhyme you something pretty, or make the words flow onto this paper, like magic.
Blood and tears, I cannot share.
Can't you just look me in the eye?
Or are you scared of the scars you'll see?
Love, I want to know.
Is it just how this feels?
A complicated row.
In circles, we go.
Pull my trigger.
And set me off.
I'll tell you just how I feel.
And keep my message in a bottle.
Locked away, in your thoughts.
I can't tell you, now.
No, you've gone on.
Were you ever even there?
In my past. In my dreams.
Is this true?
Are we real, and is this something pure?
We forever share.
Can I tell you a lie?
Just to make you smile?
Pull my trigger.
Let me fall.
Tie the knot. 
And I'm in pieces.
You're there, and I'm here.
Bundled with the flaws.
With no resist.
See eye to eye.
No, we cannot.
You can't look at me.
Too afraid.
Pull my trigger. [x2]
And let me fall forever.
-[End]-
